RZSOLITAIRE.Description: Integrates the solitaire card game for encounter generation in Resonance Zero SRP.
RZSOLITAIRE.NarrativePrompt: Narrative Prompt: Imagine a scene based on this challenge and the context of your last card move. Describe it in the chat! How does your Traveler perceive or interact with this unfolding reality distortion?
RZSOLITAIRE.RollSectionPrompt: When ready to resolve, select your character and click below to roll:
RZSOLITAIRE.NoActorSelected: Please select a player character to roll for the challenge.
RZSOLITAIRE.InfoDiscardShuffled: Discard pile shuffled back into draw deck!
RZSOLITAIRE.ErrorNoCardsToMove: No cards to move! Draw a card or reset the game.
RZSOLITAIRE.InfoGameReset: Solitaire game reset. New deck shuffled.
